Block.Description: Float demultiplexer. Creates individual scalar outputs from input array.

Block.Name: Less than (<)
Block.Description: Checks if in1 is less than in2. Returns 1 if the condition is true, 0 otherwise.

Block.Name: [Sensor Hub]
Block.Description: Sensor Hub provides links to sensor and algorithms in order to retrieve data from them.

Property.Name: Data Rate
Property.Description: Defines the sensor's and algorithm's data rate in Hz. If accelerometer or gyroscope is selected as data rate source, the closest higher available output data rate (ODR) is selected.

InitCode.Line: Sensor_Hub_Init(%Data Rate Control%, %Data Rate%, %Accelerometer Full Scale%, %Gyroscope Full Scale%);

Block.Name: Acceleration [g]
Block.Description: Retrieve the accelerometer data.

Block.Name: Greater than (>)
Block.Description: Checks if in1 is greater than in2. Returns 1 if the condition is true, 0 otherwise.

Block.Name: Temperature [°C]
Block.Description: Retrieve the temperature sensor data.

Output.Name: data
Output.Description: Temperature sensor data (ambient temperature) in Celsius degrees.

Block.Name: Humidity [percent]
Block.Description: Retrieve the humidity sensor data.

Output.Name: data
Output.Description: Humidity sensor data (relative humidity) in percentage.

Block.Description: Defines float constant.

Block.Name: Tilt Sensing
Block.Description: Retrieves real-time information about the tilt angles of the device. Sample rate for this algorithm is 25Hz, Data Rate of the Sensor Hub must be set equal or higher.

Property.Name: Mode
Property.Description: In Mode 1 the library returns pitch, roll and gravity inclination, in Mode 2 theta, psi and phi angles. For details please see MotionTL user manual UM2277.

Block.Name: Tilt Sensing
Block.Description: Retrieves real-time information about the tilt angles of the device. Sample rate for this algorithm is 25Hz, Data Rate of the Sensor Hub must be set equal or higher.

Property.Name: Mode
Property.Description: In Mode 1 the library returns pitch, roll and gravity inclination, in Mode 2 theta, psi and phi angles. For details please see MotionTL user manual UM2277.

Block.Name: Quaternions 9X
Block.Description: Retrieves the oriantion data in the magnetic North referential. The output data is an orientation in quaternion format. The orinatation is computed usign accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer sensor. Sample rate for this algorithm is 100Hz, Data Rate of the Sensor Hub must be set equal or higher.

Block.Name: Magnetic Field [uT]
Block.Description: Retrieve the magnetometer data.

Block.Name: Pressure [hPa]
Block.Description: Retrieve the presurre sensor data.

Output.Name: data
Output.Description: Pressure sensor data (atmosferic pressure) in hPa.

Block.Name: Fusion
Block.Description: Displays 3d visualization.

Property.Name: Model Name
Property.Description: Name of model which will be used for visualization.

Block.Name: Graph
Block.Description: Graph. Displays up to six real-time curves. The X-axis represents time, Y-axis is value.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to plot (y-axis value). The input data size has to match with number of curves.

Property.Name: Data Type
Property.Description: Enables easy setting of waveform names and units to apropriate values.

Property.Name: Number of Curves
Property.Description: Defines number of curves to plot. Value must be from 1 to 6.

Block.Name: Value
Block.Description: Displays up to eight integer values.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to display. The input data size has to match with number of values.

Property.Name: Data Type
Property.Description: Enables easy setting of value names and units to apropriate values.

Property.Name: Number of Values
Property.Description: Defines number of values to display. Value must be from 1 to 8.

Block.Name: Value
Block.Description: Displays up to eight integer values.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to display. The input data size has to match with number of values.

Property.Name: Data Type
Property.Description: Enables easy setting of value names and units to apropriate values.

Property.Name: Number of Values
Property.Description: Defines number of values to display. Value must be from 1 to 8.
